full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: Orphan Pipeline Pre-Abandonment Activities

###(reverse engineered title via English title: Orphan Pipeline pre-abandonment activities)
### Date of Publication: October 6, 2023

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Number: 84084-23-0101

This announcement concerns the request for proposals (RFP) for pre-abandonment activities related to an orphan pipeline. The [Canada Energy Regulator (CER)](https://www.cer-rec.gc.ca/ indicated that it will require a contractor to undertake a range of works, including documentation and surveys. The work is expected to take place from the date of the contract to March 31, 2024.

**Procurement Details**

*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive (Open Bidding)
*   **Trade Agreements**: The bid is subject to the following Agreements Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA); Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement; North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA); Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement; Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA); and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: N/A
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Calgary, Alberta
*   **Contracting Entity**: Canada Energy Regulator (CER)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: none
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: none

**Contact Details**

*   **Contact Person**: Ngan Loi
*   **Contact Email**:;<ngan.loi@cer-rec.gc.ca>
*   **Contact Phone**: 403389-3354

### Tender Package

Tender packages are available at the following links:

*   **English Package**: [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21659/84084-23-0101-rfp-amendment-03-2023-11-28-%28en.pdf)
*   **French Package**: [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21659/84084-23-0101-rfp-amendment-03-2023-11-28-%28fr.pdf)

**Note**: *The period of the Contract mentioned above is from date of Contract to March 31, 2024 inclusive.*
